name: AVPlayerViewDelegate
desc: A protocol that defines the methods to implement to participate in the player view’s full-screen presentation life cycle.

items.name: func playerViewWillEnterFullScreen(AVPlayerView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the player view is about to enter full-screen mode.

items.name: func playerViewDidEnterFullScreen(AVPlayerView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the player view entered full-screen mode.

items.name: func playerViewWillExitFullScreen(AVPlayerView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the player view is about to exit full-screen mode.

items.name: func playerViewDidExitFullScreen(AVPlayerView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the player view exited full-screen mode.

items.name: func playerView(AVPlayerView, restoreUserInterfaceForFullScreenExitWithCompletionHandler: (Bool) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to restore the app’s user interface when exiting full-screen mode.
